[Verse 1]
[ch]G[/ch]                  [ch]D/F#[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]                       [ch]D[/ch]
  It's late in the evening, she's wondering what clothes to wear.
[ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D/F#[/ch]    [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]
  She puts on her make-up, and brushes her long blond hair.
[ch]C[/ch]               [ch]D[/ch]     [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]D/F#[/ch]     [ch]Em[/ch]
  And then she asks me "Do I look all right?"
            [ch]C[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch]            [ch]G[/ch]
And I say "Yes, you look wonderful tonight!"

[Instrumental]
[ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D/F#[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]

[Verse 2]
[ch]G[/ch]            [ch]D/F#[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]

  This beautiful lady, that's walking around with me. 
[ch]C[/ch]              [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]                  [ch]Em[/ch]
  And then she asks me: "Do you feel all right?"
             [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]
And I say: "Yes, I feel wonderful tonight!"

[Bridge]
        [ch]C[/ch]           [ch]D[/ch]               [ch]G[/ch]        [ch]D/F#[/ch]      [ch]Em[/ch]

And the wonder of it all is that you just don't realize,
            [ch]G[/ch]
How much I love you!

[Instrumental]
[ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D/F#[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]
[ch]G[/ch]  [ch]D/F#[/ch]  [ch]C[/ch]  [ch]D[/ch]

[ch]G[/ch]                 [ch]D/F#[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]

[ch]G[/ch]                   [ch]D/F#[/ch]     [ch]C[/ch]         [ch]D[/ch]

[ch]C[/ch]             [ch]D[/ch]       [ch]G[/ch]     [ch]D/F#[/ch]          [ch]Em[/ch]

            [ch]C[/ch]                [ch]D[/ch]           [ch]G[/ch]      [ch]D/F#[/ch]     [ch]Em[/ch]

content.text:
[Author’s note] After playing this song with the chords I used to play for years,
only recently I realized that I’d been playing the wrong chords or in the wrong
key and that all the other previous submissions (of this song's tabs) here on
UG and other similar chords and tabs websites have been far from accurate
(except those versions that are different from the original version or are not
played in the original key, and either way I respect all tabs created out
there), so I made this one for some random awesomeness. Although, it’s an old
song, it’s what I used when I first tried learning to play the guitar so this is
unquestionably remarkable to me indeed. Huling El Bimbo will always be one of my
most favorite songs. :)

Artist: Eraserheads
Tabbed by: Alnel Vincent T. Alico
Email: alnelextreme@yahoo.com

[ch]D#m[/ch] or [ch]Ebm[/ch]  xx1342
[ch]C#[/ch] or [ch]Db[/ch]    x46664
